Component.Description: This component is part of the RTMaps SDK samples, provided with source code. It shows how to write a custom clock for RTMaps inside your own component. In this component, the clock timespeed can vary according to the "timespeed" property.

Property.Description: The desired timespeed that will be applied by the custom clock. 1000 means real-time (100%), 5000 means 5 times quicker than real-time, etc... This value cannot be negative.
